message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not comfortable going as low as $120. How about we meet in the middle at $170? It's still a great deal for you, and I'm willing to compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $150, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $150?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $160? It's still a great deal for you, and I'm willing to make a final concession.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm sticking to my previous offer of $150. Can you meet me at that price?
I've already compromised a lot, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $155, but that's my final offer.
I understand you've made a final offer, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to pay $155. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is my final offer. Please consider it.
